messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: My engineer messed up the supermatter set up and now it's going nuclear.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: Remember the engineer that nearly made the SM blow up? yeah he ran into it

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Primary Tool Storage.
